characters.name: Cantarella
characters.quote: The sea is a mirror, it reflects the shape of your soul in it's tide.
characters.description: The Fisalia family's thirty-sixth head, Cantarella Fisalia. She locks your gaze with eyes as deep as the ocean, where dark tides seem to surge and swirl.

skills.name: Illusion Collapse
skills.description: Performs a series of attacks with her Rectifier

characters.name: Ciaccona
characters.quote: Off we go! May my poems light the way on your path ahead!
characters.description: A free-spirited, romantic, sincere, and passionate bard. On her journey, she sang radiant poems of saints and heroes, weaving tales of people, miracles, turmoil, and suffering.

characters.name: Jiyan
characters.quote: The wind carries my blade, and my blade carries justice.
characters.description: A member of the Midnight Rangers, Jiyan is a skilled warrior who uses the power of wind to enhance his combat abilities.

characters.name: Aalto
characters.quote: The Black Shores will always be my home, no matter where I go.
characters.description: A member of the Black Shores, Aalto is a skilled marksman who uses dual pistols infused with the power of wind.

characters.name: Jianxin
characters.quote: My fists are guided by the wind, and my heart by honor.
characters.description: A practitioner of Fengyiquan, Jianxin uses martial arts enhanced by the power of wind.

characters.name: Yangyang
characters.quote: The wind whispers secrets to those who listen carefully.
characters.description: A mysterious figure who harnesses the power of wind for both combat and healing.

characters.name: Calcharo
characters.quote: Lightning strikes where I command, and my blade follows.
characters.description: A member of the Ghost Hounds from Huanglong, Calcharo wields a massive broadblade charged with electric energy.

characters.name: Lumi
characters.quote: Logistics and lightning - both require precision and speed.
characters.description: A member of Lollo Logistics from Yuezhou, Lumi combines her business acumen with her electro powers.

characters.name: Changli
characters.quote: The flames of justice burn eternal in my blade.
characters.description: A representative of City Hall in Jinzhou, Changli uses her fusion powers to protect the citizens.

characters.name: Encore
characters.quote: Every performance deserves an encore, especially the final one.
characters.description: A member of the Black Shores, Encore uses her rectifier to channel fusion energy in devastating attacks.

characters.name: Chixia
characters.quote: The Public Security Bureau ensures that justice burns bright.
characters.description: A member of the Public Security Bureau in Huanglong, Chixia uses dual pistols infused with fusion energy.

characters.name: Mortefi
characters.quote: Fire cleanses all impurities, including doubt.
characters.description: A mysterious gunslinger who uses fusion-infused bullets to eliminate threats.

characters.name: Brant
characters.quote: The Troupe of Fools brings both entertainment and destruction.
characters.description: A member of the Troupe of Fools from Rinascita, Brant combines showmanship with deadly fusion attacks.

characters.name: Baizhi
characters.quote: Knowledge is like ice - beautiful, clear, and potentially dangerous.
characters.description: A scholar from Huaxu Academy in Jinzhou, Baizhi uses her rectifier to channel glacio energy for both offense and defense.

characters.name: Lingyang
characters.quote: The Liondance Troupe's performances are as beautiful as freshly fallen snow.
characters.description: A performer from the Liondance Troupe, Lingyang uses ice-infused martial arts in both performances and combat.

characters.name: Carlotta
characters.quote: The Montelli Family's influence is as vast as a glacier.
characters.description: A member of the Montelli Family from Rinascita, Carlotta uses dual pistols that fire ice-infused bullets.

characters.name: Camellya
characters.quote: Chaos is simply order waiting to be deciphered.
characters.description: A member of the Black Shores, Camellya wields a sword infused with havoc energy that can tear through reality.

characters.name: Danjin
characters.quote: The Midnight Rangers walk the line between order and chaos.
characters.description: A member of the Midnight Rangers, Danjin uses havoc energy to enhance his swordsmanship.

characters.name: Jinhsi
characters.quote: Light reveals truth, but sometimes truth is better left hidden.
characters.description: A representative of City Hall in Jinzhou, Jinhsi uses spectro energy to both illuminate and blind.

characters.name: Sanhua
characters.quote: Please don't stay too far away from me. I am confident to not let you get harmed in the slightest.
characters.description: A loyal and reliable guard for Jinhsi, Sanhua is composed and reserved. She perceives a world distinctly different from that in the eyes of others, and her body temperature is below normal.

characters.name: Shorekeeper
characters.quote: "The Shorekeeper"... This name suits me well enough. It aligns with my purpose and drive: they only exist because of you
characters.description: A mysterious figure from the Black Shores who wields a powerful rectifier infused with spectro energy.

characters.name: Rover
characters.quote: Is this the beginning of a new journey? Brimming with novel sounds, and untold stories...
characters.description: Awakened with an unknown past, Rover is an Arbiter who embarks on a journey to uncover the truth to regain their lost memories. As a unique Resonator, Rover can harness multiple elemental powers.

characters.name: Phoebe
characters.quote: The Order of the Deep holds many secrets, as do I.
characters.description: A mysterious member of the Order of the Deep from Rinascita, Phoebe uses her rectifier to channel spectro energy.

characters.name: Roccia
characters.quote: The Troupe of Fools brings entertainment through chaos.
characters.description: A powerful member of the Troupe of Fools from Rinascita, Roccia uses havoc-infused gauntlets in combat.

characters.name: Taoqi
characters.quote: Development requires both creation and destruction.
characters.description: A member of the Ministry of Development in Jinzhou, Taoqi wields a massive broadblade infused with havoc energy.

characters.name: Verina
characters.quote: The Pioneer Association lights the way for all.
characters.description: A member of the Pioneer Association in Jinzhou, Verina uses her rectifier to channel spectro energy for both exploration and combat.

characters.name: Xiangli Yao
characters.quote: Knowledge and power go hand in hand.
characters.description: A scholar from Huaxu Academy in Jinzhou, Xiangli Yao uses electro-infused gauntlets in combat.

characters.name: Yinlin
characters.quote: The Public Security Bureau ensures order through power.
characters.description: A member of the Public Security Bureau in Jinzhou, Yinlin uses her rectifier to channel electro energy.

characters.name: Youhu
characters.quote: The cold never bothered me anyway.
characters.description: A resident of Chongzi in Huanglong, Youhu uses ice-infused gauntlets in combat.

characters.name: Yuanwu
characters.quote: Assuming I've thought my decisions through and acted with integrity, I am content.
characters.description: He owns a boxing gym where he teaches martial arts and health management, and is well-respected in the community for his cordial demeanor and pleasant temperament.

characters.name: Zani
characters.quote: Work will keep coming. Don't forget to live a little.
characters.description: She is a staff member of the Montelli Family's Averardo Bank in Ragunna. As a serious and reliable Montelli employee, Zani follows a strict routine and manages tasks with ease. For years, she has clocked in on time without fail, finding as much enjoyment in her well-ordered life as in her carefully planned moments of leisure.

characters.name: Zhezhi
characters.quote: What I wanted to say is, the sunlight on you right now is so beautiful, Can I... paint you?
characters.description: She is a commissioned painter, quiet and shy with a dedication to her craft. She's not very eloquent, but her persistence and love for painting speak volumes.
